Digital_Input_Digital_Input_State.title: Digital Input State
Digital_Input_Digital_Input_State.description: The current state of a digital input.

Digital_Input_Digital_Input_Counter.title: Digital Input Counter
Digital_Input_Digital_Input_Counter.description: The cumulative value of active state detected.

Digital_Input_Digital_Input_Polarity.title: Digital Input Polarity
Digital_Input_Digital_Input_Polarity.description: The polarity of the digital input as a Boolean (False = Normal, True = Reversed).

Digital_Input_Digital_Input_Edge_Selecti.title: Digital Input Edge Selection
Digital_Input_Digital_Input_Edge_Selecti.description: The edge selection as an integer (1 = Falling edge, 2 = Rising edge, 3 = Both Rising and Falling edge).

Digital_Input_Application_Type.title: Application Type
Digital_Input_Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

Digital_Input_Sensor_Type.title: Sensor Type
Digital_Input_Sensor_Type.description: The type of the sensor (for instance PIR type).

Digital_Input_Timestamp.title: Timestamp
Digital_Input_Timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the measurement was performed.

Digital_Input_Fractional_Timestamp.title: Fractional Timestamp
Digital_Input_Fractional_Timestamp.description: Fractional part of the timestamp when sub-second precision is used (e.g., 0.23 for 230 ms).
